remarks: The value of the cardinal number function.  Definition 10.4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 85.  See ~ cardval2 for a simpler version of its value.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)
statement:
cardval.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
cardval $p |- ( card ` A ) = |^| { x e. On | x ~~ A } $.
$d A x $.
